# Description

I'm a faculty liaison in the University Library, for philosophy and psychology. Within the Data and Publication support department of the Library, I'm a member of the Erasmus Library ORCID team and working on 'research intelligence'.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Judith Gulpers"
special_skill <- "ORCID"

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("open source software", "preregistration", "data sharing", "reproducible analysis", "data management", all_of(special_skill)), "open access")

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
